dynamic_line.yes: Welcome, dear madam, to our little village. Please make yourself comfortable, I think a woman of your stature is safer here than in the outside world.
dynamic_line.no: Another wayfarer has found our oasis in the abyss of violence that surrounds us! Good sir, I think you'll have a fine time here, plenty of friendly men and women. Although sometimes the women can be a little too friendly, if you ask me!

responses.text: So you're a man in this town? What does someone of your status do in these parts?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: A woman like you should get the grasp of it, I act as the head of my household, work in the mill, and defend the town in times of trouble. Sure, it might not be fit for a woman, but what more could a man ask for in this life?
dynamic_line.no: A fellow gentleman like you should understand well enough, I act as the head of my household, work in the mill, and defend the town in times of trouble. What more could a man ask for in this life?
